text: Blackmail is a 1939 American crime drama movie directed by H. C. Potter and starring Edward G. Robinson, Ruth Hussey, Gene Lockhart, Bobs Watson, John Wray, Arthur Hohl, Esther Dale. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1939 drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by H. C. Potter Category:1939 crime movies
title: Blackmail (1939 movie)
